content:
Hi y'all!

I'm Owen/Muirrum, and I'm going to be helping out the Triage working group. I got interested in contributing because I read @Elinvynia 's blog post. I've been gradually getting more experienced with Rust over the course of my mandatory stay-at-home period. I use they/them pronouns.
hi @Owen Salter welcome here :slight_smile:
